sentences.sentence: At certain cadential points, he inserts brief cadenzas that add an improvisational touch.
sentences.translation: 在某些节拍上，他加入一些简单的用于即席弹奏的装饰乐段。

sentences.sentence: I could hardly keep from laughing when some of the cadenzas imitated the warbling of birds.
sentences.translation: 当我听到那些唱乐曲终了的华彩句的歌手，模仿着鸟的啭鸣时，我就禁不住要笑。

sentences.sentence: In some years, April bursts up Virginnia hills in one prodigious leap-and all the stage is filled at once, whole chorusesof tulips, arabesques of forsythia,cadenzas of flowering plum.
sentences.translation: 有时候，四月一个健步就跃上了弗吉尼亚的小山丘。 顿时，整个舞台活跃起来：郁金香们引吭高歌，连翘花翩翩起舞，梅花表演起了独奏。
